title: 今天怎么突然升级了？！
author: zmy07
txt_content:
今天上MC突然蹦出来一个Galacticraft is downloading sounds to your minecraft directory，然后总是下载失败，怎么回事？





小Q截图-20140409162156.png
(19.89 KB, 下载次数: 0)




下载附件


2014-4-9 16:23 上传








具体

replies.author: zmy07
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 zmy07 于 2014-4-9 16:27 编辑 

图挂了，具体是
Galacticraft is downloading sounds to your minecraft diretory
This will only occur once,or when new sounds are added to the mod
Ensure you have an internet connection available
过了一会底下出现一行红字，是
Download Failed
IOException,unable to open connection to URL

replies.author: 无敌小阿沫
replies.txt_content: 论坛升级不是很正常吗-0-

replies.author: zmy07
replies.txt_content:
zhoujiong 发表于 2014-4-9 16:43
论坛升级不是很正常吗-0-
我说的是游戏，好像是星系mod

replies.author: zmy07
replies.txt_content:
1277832129 发表于 2014-4-9 17:35
正在下载音乐包
总是失败QAQ

replies.author: zmy07
replies.txt_content: 自己解决了：花半小时把mod整理一遍，星系mod删掉就好了
论坛升级不是很正常吗-0-
